1.title: Fernando provoca la muerte de Don Bernardo Elizondo
1.plot: Fernando tries to blackmail Don Bernardo by threatening to reveal that he has a lover. When Bernardo refuses to give in to his demands, Fernando provokes Bernardo's horse to fall and kill him.

2.title: Libia es asesinada por ser amante de Bernardo
2.plot: Libia arrives at Bernardo's funeral and confesses that she was his lover. Fernando decides he must get rid of Libia and murders her.

3.title: Los hermanos Reyes buscan venganza
3.plot: Juan, Óscar and Franco Reyes arrive at Hacienda San Agustín and pretend to be looking for work in order to find the man who murdered their sister Libia.

4.title: Las hermanas Elizondo se enamoran
4.plot: Sofía, Jimena and Sara Elizondo are thrilled by the arrival of the Reyes brothers and become excited when they discover all three men are single.

5.title: Fernando trata de abusar de Sofía
5.plot: Sofía feels a strong attraction to Juan but, because of her marriage to Fernando, she cannot act on her feelings. Fernando tries to abuse Sofia, and she escapes on horseback.

6.title: Sofía le pone un alto a Fernando
6.plot: Sofía is tired of being mistreated by her husband Fernando and decides to confront him publicly about his actions.

7.title: Fernando confiesa que violó a Sofía
7.plot: Fernando vows to do anything to keep Sofía by his side and confesses that he raped her shortly before they were married.

8.title: Juan acepta que se enamoró de Sofía
8.plot: Juan can no longer hide what he feels for Sofía and decides to confess his love to her. Sofía has feelings for Juan as well, but her marriage to Fernando makes their love impossible.

9.title: Fernando descubre a Sofía y Juan juntos
9.plot: Sofía and Juan steal away in the stables for a romantic moment, but Fernando discovers them just as they are about to kiss.

10.title: Rosario le rompe el corazón a Franco
10.plot: Fernando threatens Rosario with never seeing her son again if she doesn't leave Franco. Rosario makes the painful decision to stay away from Franco.

11.title: Sofía sufre ante el recuerdo de su violación
11.plot: Fernando insists that he is entitled to consummate his marriage to Sofía, but she refuses to go through with it because of the traumatic memories of her rape.

12.title: Sofía está dispuesta a confesar su amor por Juan
12.plot: Sofía is finally convinced that she should confess to Juan that she loves him.

13.title: Gabriela busca casar a sus hijas
13.plot: Gabriela is determined to find husbands for her daughters as soon as possible.

14.title: Juan revela documentos con información secreta
14.plot: Juan reveals secret documents that include information about the ranch.

15.title: Sofía no soporta más y se va de la casa
15.plot: Unable to suffer the abuse any longer, Sofía packs her bags and leaves home.

16.title: Juan y Sofía tienen un momento íntimo
16.plot: Juan and Sofía make love for the first time.

17.title: Juan en el hospital declara su amor
17.plot: While in the hospital, Juan declares his love for Sofía.

18.title: Fernando sospecha y casi descubre amor entre Juan y Sofía
18.plot: While Sofía is being taken to the monastery, Juan and Fernando encounter her. Juan is grateful to have saved her and almost reveals their secret affair.

19.title: Sofía no cumple su promesa
19.plot: Sofía changes her mind and decides not to run away with Juan like they had planned, breaking his heart.

20.title: Sofía decide regresar con varias condiciones
20.plot: After thinking it over, Sofía decides to go back to the convent on the condition that her grandfather is allowed to return and that she does not have to sleep with Fernando.

21.title: La hacienda queda a cargo de Sofía
21.plot: Sofía rebels against Fernando and her mother by taking control of the hacienda accounts and everything related to its management.

22.title: Sofía cae en trampa de Fernando
22.plot: Fernando sets a trap to get Sofía back at all costs. Juan arrives to confess his love to Sofía anew.

23.title: Sofía recibe sorpresa de Juan en su cuarto
23.plot: Fernando climbs up a rope to Sofía's window while she's sleeping. She's delighted by his surprise appearance and the two share an intimate moment that Fernando nearly interrupts.

24.title: Oscar abraza a Rosario y peligra su promesa con Jimena
24.plot: Oscar nearly breaks his promise to Jimena when he embraces Rosario and considers sleeping with her.

25.title: Sofía descubre que está embarazada
25.plot: Sofía is shocked to discover that she is pregnant, news that threatens to expose her affair with Juan.

26.title: Sofía revela que tendrá un hijo
26.plot: Unable to hide it, Sofía confesses that she is expecting a baby.

27.title: Sofía hace fuerte declaración de su embarazo
27.plot: Sofía refuses to be embarrassed and announces her pregnancy to everyone at the ranch.

28.title: Juan quiere revelar la verdad de su pasado a Sofía
28.plot: Juan is tempted to reveal the truth of his past to Sofía but fears she might not love him after she knows.

29.title: Óscar y Franco Reyes a la cárcel por asesinos
29.plot: Everyone is shocked when Oscar and Juan are sent to jail on suspicion of murder.

30.title: Juan y Fernando llegan a golpes
30.plot: Juan and Fernando's hatred for each other boils over into a brutal fistfight.

31.title: Fernando intenta matar a Sofía
31.plot: Fernando causes Sofía to fall off her horse, endangering her life and her pregnancy. Meanwhile, the Reyes brothers are found guilty.

32.title: Juan irrumpe en la hacienda
32.plot: Despite the possible consequences, Juan arrives at the ranch to save Sofía and reveal that he is the father of her baby.

33.title: Incendio en la panadería Reyes
33.plot: Seething with resentment, Gabriela sets the Reyes bakery on fire with Juan and Sofía still inside.

34.title: Jimena y Óscar pelean por infidelidad
34.plot: Oscar falls into the arms of a new ballerina without knowing that Jimena has been watching him. Meanwhile, the authorities investigate the fire at the bakery to discover the culprit.

35.title: La Malquerida se vacía sin Rosario
35.plot: After Rosario leaves to go on tour, Fernando's bar is left without customers because Rosario's replacement Maracuya is unconvincing.

36.title: Juan desconfía en Sofía
36.plot: After an argument, Juan reacts impulsively and doubts Sofía's fidelity because of a supposed love affair between Fernando and a mystery woman.

37.title: Doña Gabriela hiere a Juan
37.plot: During a nasty fight, Juan defends Sofía from the blows of her mother and sisters. This leaves Juan gravely injured and suffering a fever.

38.title: Gabriela apunta con arma a Sofía y Juan
38.plot: When Sofía arrives at the ranch to see her mother, Fernando follows her. Gabriela becomes furious when she sees Sofía and Fernando together and holds them at gunpoint.

39.title: Fernando y Gabriela tienen un momento íntimo
39.plot: After a serious threats about his debts, Fernando decides to seduce Gabriela and the two share an intimate moment.

40.title: Óscar le es infiel a Jimena
40.plot: Óscar falls for Maracuya's seduction and sleeps with her, infuriating and hurting his wife Jimena. Sofía suffers an accident and Juan helps her.

41.title: Sofía queda traumada tras ataque
41.plot: Sofía, traumatized after suffering an attempted rape, rejects Juan when he tries to help her and appears as though she is losing her mind.

42.title: Sofía se va de casa de Juan
42.plot: Sofía abandons Juan, leaving a letter for him explaining that she is leaving because she cannot let him suffer any longer because of her trauma.

43.title: Boda de Jimena y Óscar
43.plot: Jimena and Óscar get married discretely in a civil ceremony. The truth comes out that Rosario is Sarita's sister and that Eva had a baby with her father.

44.title: Óscar y Jimena tienen luna de miel
44.plot: After their civil ceremony, Óscar organizes a honeymoon and gets down on one knee to give Jimena a wedding ring.

45.title: Franco a punto de morir
45.plot: While Sarita and Benito's wedding takes place, Franco suffers severe burns in an accident and ends up near death.

46.title: Llega un nuevo Reyes
46.plot: Surprising everyone, a new member of the Reyes family arrives in the village. Franco is still in delicate condition at the hospital.

47.title: Gabriela descubre matrimonio
47.plot: Gabriela catches Jimena and Oscar in bed together, accusing them of having an affair. The two are forced to confess that they are already married.

48.title: ¡Rosario despierta!
48.plot: Rosario awakes and begins to recuperate, while Franco is still unconscious in delicate condition. Juan begins to suspect his parents were murdered.

49.title: Fernando asesina a Anselmo
49.plot: Rosario confesses to Anselmo that Fernando raped her in the past. Furious, Anselmo seeks him out for revenge. Fernando wins the fight and murders him.

50.title: Óscar se entera de amorío secreto
50.plot: Gabriela invites Óscar to the ranch, where he secretly discovers a love affair between her and Fernando.

51.title: Sofía sufre accidente
51.plot: When Gabriela reveals that Eva is not Rosario's rightful mother, Sofía flees the ranch and accidentally falls down the stairs.

52.title: Peligra la vida del hijo de Sofía
52.plot: Juan and Sofía's baby is near death after Sofía's accidental fall down the stairs. Óscar threatens Gabriela and Fernando.

53.title: Fernando y Gabriela se van a casar
53.plot: Surprising everyone, Fernando and Gabriela announce they are getting married. After much doubt, Sofía's baby miraculously survives.

54.title: Fernando quiere matar a Franco
54.plot: While Franco recuperates, Fernando sneaks into his room to kill him and finally be done with their feud.

55.title: Rosario renuncia al amor de Franco
55.plot: Rosario sacrifices the love she feels for Franco so that her sister Sarita can be happy with him instead.

56.title: Juana gana concurso de Jaripeo
56.plot: Facing serious competition, Juan prevails and manages to win a card game against Fernando.

57.title: Sofía es la única heredera
57.plot: Gabriela confesses again that Sofía is not her rightful daughter, but she discovers that Sofía is the only heir to the family fortune nonetheless.

58.title: Sofía es envenenada
58.plot: Fernando announces that he does not accept divorce from Sofía as a ploy to impede her wedding to Juan. In an attempt to get rid of her for good, Fernando poisons Sofía.

59.title: Óscar amenaza a Fernando y Gabriela
59.plot: Óscar threatens to reveal Fernando and Gabriela's dark secrets after discovering their relationship.

60.title: Boda de Franco y Sarita
60.plot: Franco and Sarita enjoy their wedding day despite Gabriela's negativity. Sofía recovers from Fernando's attempted poisoning thanks to Juan.

61.title: Sofía a punto de descubrir secreto
61.plot: By accident, Sofía discovers a document that reveals the dark secrets of the Reyes brothers.

62.title: Se descubre secreto de los Reyes
62.plot: The Reyes brothers reveal that they have been seeking revenge against Sofía and her family for causing their sister's death.

63.title: Sofía y Juan no se reconcilian
63.plot: After discovering the Reyes's true motives, Sofía leaves Juan and refuses to forgive him for trying to use her for revenge.

64.title: Los Reyes buscan recuperar los suyo
64.plot: The Reyes brothers seek more proof of their rightful ownership over the hacienda.

65.title: Los Reyes recuperan la hacienda
65.plot: The Reyes brothers find their father's will which proves that they have rightful ownership of the hacienda.

66.title: Sofía y Juan no se han reconciliado
66.plot: Juan is unsuccessful in reconciling with Sofía because dark, bloody feuds between their families have come between them.

67.title: Rosario descubre secreto oculto
67.plot: In a tearful moment, Sofía and Juan separate. Rosario discovers that she is not Margarita's daughter, but actually Eva's.

68.title: Los Reyes manejan la hacienda
68.plot: With help from their Uncle Vicente, the Reyes Brothers legally take ownership of the hacienda and plot their revenge against the Elizondo family.

69.title: Nace el bebé de Sofía
69.plot: After enduring hours of painful labor with Rosario and Sarita's help, Sofía gives birth to a healthy baby girl whom she names María Guadalupe.

70.title: Se pierde Juan
70.plot: To everyone's surprise, Juan disappears with his new baby daughter María Guadalupe. The entire town helps Sofía in her desperate search for the kidnapped baby.

71.title: Se revela secreto de los Reyes
71.plot: With Juan still missing, El Coyote tells Fernando that 'El jefe' is the uncle of the Reyes Brothers and that he seeks Fernando's protection.

72.title: ¿La hija de Sofía está muerta?
72.plot: Gabriela viciously insists that Sofía will never see her daughter again because she is dead. Meanwhile, Sarita falls gravely ill.

73.title: Juan reaparece
73.plot: Juan reappears with several grave injuries after surviving a native ceremony that involved burning Dr. Castañeda alive.

74.title: Franco a punto de encontrar a Juan
74.plot: Fernando buys a ring for Gabriela. Franco is close to finding Juan, which means deciding to stay with Leonora or return to the hacienda.

75.title: Fernando se casa
75.plot: Fernando defiantly marries Gabriela in the face of everyone's disapproval. Franco fails in his attempt to find Juan, who continues to be seduced by Leonora.

76.title: Embrujan a Juan
76.plot: After their civil ceremony, Óscar organizes a honeymoon and gets down on one knee to give Jimena a wedding ring.

77.title: Juan empieza a recuperar
77.plot: While Sarita and Benito's wedding takes place, Franco suffers severe burns in an accident and ends up near death.

78.title: Juan salva su vida en La Selva
78.plot: Sofia is going to talk to Sarita, try to make her reconsider about her decision to be a nun. Fernando annoys Óscar while he works, tells him that he probably married Jimena for his money.

79.title: Fernando golpea a Rosario
79.plot: Óscar tells Jimena that he loves her and that's why he endures all the humiliations of his mother, she replies that Gabriela is probably putting him to the test and when he realizes that he really loves her, he will change.

80.title: Gabriela en peligro
80.plot: Surprising everyone, a new member of the Reyes family arrives in the village. Franco is still in delicate condition at the hospital.

81.title: Demian rescata a Gabriela
81.plot: Gabriela tells Sofía that she will marry Fernando. Fernando tells Rosario that he has to return to sing because they are losing a lot of money. Juan arrives with Sofia at his house, everyone welcomes him.

82.title: Sofía cree que Juan sigue vivo
82.plot: Fernando tries to kill Franco, but at the moment he is going to do it, he wakes up. Franco tries to take the bandage off his head, Fernando takes the opportunity to disconnect him. The doctors come to save Franco's life.

83.title: Juan regresa
83.plot: Gabriela catches Jimena and Oscar in bed together, accusing them of having an affair. The two are forced to confess that they are already married.

84.title: Sofía pide a su hija de vuelta
84.plot: Rosario awakes and begins to recuperate, while Franco is still unconscious in delicate condition. Juan begins to suspect his parents were murdered.

85.title: Encarcelan a Juan
85.plot: Juan and Óscar tell Pedro that Franco does not know who he loves, if Rosario or Sarita. Fernando asks Rosario to return to sing because they are losing a lot of money, she replies that she has decided to completely change her way of life.

86.title: Juan es liberado
86.plot: Rachel tells Benito that they filed a lawsuit against her husband. Gabriela arrives at the convent to visit Sarita, learns that her daughter no longer lives there and that Father Tadeo was the one who convinced her to leave.

87.title: Rosario es asesinada
87.plot: Sarita goes to Don Agustín's cabin to ask for asylum, he receives her with open arms. Raquel looks for some papers and is with the belt of her husband, this is the same one that the killer of the father of the Kings used.

88.title: Sospechan del asesino de Rosario
88.plot: Juan warns Raquel, Fernando and Gabriela that he has started a lawsuit to recover his lands. Fernando and Gabriela talk about the demand that Juan mentioned, they do not understand what he was referring to.

89.title: Regresan a la hacienda Ruth
89.plot: Gabriela invites Óscar to the ranch, where he secretly discovers a love affair between her and Fernando.

90.title: Juan y Sofía buscan juntos a su hija
90.plot: Fernando finds Juan in their lands, they begin to fight, but Fernando's men arrive and hold Juan while Fernando hits him. Fernando ties Juan to a horse to drag him, Franco and Óscar arrive with pistols.

91.title: Juan busca a su hija
91.plot: Juan is desperate talking to the Reyes brothers, he makes the decision to face the truth and tell the Elizondo the reason why they approached them.

92.title: Juan es encarcelado
92.plot: The three sisters Elizondo talk about their father and the relationship he had with Doña Gabriela, they reproach their mother a lot and plan to go after the mass to the grave of their father without the consent of Dona Gabriela.

93.title: Juan adopta niñas
93.plot: Fernando is unconcerned about having told Gabriela his secret, since she would not be able to tell anyone the truth, because he also knows many things about Gabriela.

94.title: Se cancela boda
94.plot: Ofelia claims to Margarita that she has hired Eva, because she only uses it to get information from Rosario, asks her to leave and not return to the town, because if she finds out the truth she will suffer a lot.

95.title: Intentan asesinar a Gabriela
95.plot: The Kings confess to the Elizondo that the girl who fell in love with Bernardo was Libya, her sister, Sofia is upset to hear the truth and claims Juan for not having told her before.

96.title: Gabriela intenta recuperar la hacienda
96.plot: Jimena asks Óscar why they came to the hacienda, he confesses that to seek revenge, but they fell in love with them and could not keep the promise.

97.title: Sofía quiere renunciar a su herencia
97.plot: The Elizondo sisters claim the Priest of the town for not informing them of the intentions of the Kings, they are completely disappointed in them since they gave them all their love, now fate makes a bad move.

98.title: Bautizan a las niñas
98.plot: Eva tells Gabriela that the only woman Bernardo loved was Libya Reyes, she replies that the only ones she hurt by letting the Reyes enter, she went to her daughters.

99.title: Juan no quiere a Sofía
99.plot: Sofia thinks about how much she would like to see Juan, goes out of her bedroom and discovers Fernando entering Gabriela's room, thinks that he just wants to play with her mother.

100.title: Sofía y Juan bautizan a sus tres hijas
100.plot: Juan is excited to find a chest buried under a tree, his surprise is bigger when he opens it and realizes that there is his father's testament.

101.title: Gabriela demanda a Sofía y le corre de su casa
101.plot: The Kings confess to the Elizondo that the girl who fell in love with Bernardo was Libya, her sister, Sofia is upset to hear the truth and claims Juan for not having told her before.

102.title: Sofía sufre al saber que su hija tiene una enfermedad de corazón
102.plot: Jimena asks Óscar why they came to the hacienda, he confesses that to seek revenge, but they fell in love with them and could not keep the promise.

103.title: Ricardo regresa para cobrar venganza
103.plot: The Elizondo sisters claim the Priest of the town for not informing them of the intentions of the Kings, they are completely disappointed in them since they gave them all their love, now fate makes a bad move.

104.title: Eva está decidida a que Ruth sepa quién es su verdadera madre
104.plot: During the dismissal of Pedro Reyes, Juan asks him to forgive his father as he gave a lot for him, leaving in Peter a break with which he will think many things to make decisions towards his father.

105.title: Se desata la pasión entre Juan y Ruth
105.plot: Juan, when talking with Agustín, tells him that Vicente Robles is his uncle and that Juan José Robles is his father, making Don Agustín deeply remember that Gabriela was the one who had a closer relationship with Juan's parents.

106.title: Fernando le confiesa a Santa su odio por Ricardo Uribe
106.plot: Finally in the courtroom, the Reyes brothers recover the land that belongs to them and Gabriela disagrees. The only thing she imagines is doing the impossible so that the other lands never fall into the hands of the Kings.

107.title: Fernando le propone a Ruth ser aliados y vengarse de Sofía
107.plot: Libia arrives at Bernardo's funeral and confesses that she was his lover. Fernando decides he must get rid of Libia and murders her.

108.title: Ruth se entera que Eva es su verdadera madre
108.plot: Fernando meets again with Raquel, not caring that Benito is with her. Raquel still believes that Benito has not noticed the relationship with Fernando, but Benito already brings them between his eyebrows, what will Benito plot now?

109.title: Óscar pierde ante Román
109.plot: Gabriela infuriates and tells Juan that he is going to take revenge on them, but he replies that he will have to answer many questions about his father.

110.title: Fernando y Ruth tienen un apasionado encuentro
110.plot: Don Agustín arrives with a newspaper and tells Gabriela that there is proof that he knew Juan José Robles, but she denies it, Don Agustín tells him that he only hopes that he has not had anything to do with his death.

111.title: Juan se entera que Bernardo no mató a sus padres
111.plot: In front of everyone, Fernando gives the engagement ring to Gabriela and asks her to be his wife.

112.title: Eva descubre la relación entre Ruth y Fernando
112.plot: Leonora tries to kiss Juan, but Juan rejects her and tells her that she is confused because he saved her life, he believes she loves him.

113.title: Óscar no volverá a caminar
113.plot: Sofía claims to Gabriela that she gave away Eva's daughter and that she told Franco that her father was in love with her.

114.title: Gabriela confiesa que Ricardo mató a los padres de Juan
114.plot: Rosario arrives at the bakery of Los Reyes, there she meets Franco, who confesses that she loves Sarita more than she imagined.

115.title: Ricardo se entera que Ruth no es su verdadera hija
115.plot: Juan dreams of his past, he starts screaming, wakes up and looks for Leonora, but he does not find her, so he goes out to look for her.

116.title: Fernando ataca a Don Agustín antes de su boda
116.plot: Juan meets Leonora and they decide to go for a walk, she tries to convince him to start a new life.

117.title: Gabriela se alegra al saber que Ruth es su hija
117.plot: In front of everyone, Fernando gives the engagement ring to Gabriela and asks her to be his wife, she happily accepts, Don Agustín asks Fernando who bought the ring, him or Gabriela.

118.title: El Coyote busca acabar con Ruth para vengarse de Ricardo
118.plot: Sofia cries inconsolably for her daughter in the forest, suddenly a man on horseback appears, she is shocked to see him.

119.title: Gabriela se entera que Fernando mató a Rosario
119.plot: Óscar arrives in the town with bad news for Sofia because he did not find Juan or his daughter.

120.title: Sofía busca justicia y quiere que Ricardo Uribe vaya a la cárcel
120.plot: Sofia cries inconsolably for her daughter, she claims Oscar who has not found her.

121.title: Juan salva la vida de Gabriela
121.plot: Demián, who rides at night, realizes that Gabriela is in danger, takes a rope and manages to get it out of the well.

122.title: Sofía sufre el desprecio de Gabriela
122.plot: Jimena clarifies to Oscar that the one that has been delivered to him, does not mean that he already forgave him.

123.title: Juan pide la mano de Sofía
123.plot: Juan thanks Silvestre for saving him, he assures him that the one who saved him was a horse.

124.title: Juan descubre el sucio plan de Ricardo Uribe
124.plot: Sofia, arrives alarmed with Fernando, tells him that they can not find Gabriela, asks her to go out and look for her, he suggests that they wait a while because it is probably another of her tantrums.

125.title: Ricardo se entera que Soledad está viva y tiene un hijo
125.plot: Sarita slaps Franco and tells him not to go back to his room, he tells her that if she put on the dress it is because she loves him, in the end Franco leaves Sarita's room.

126.title: Sofía encuentra a Ruth con Juan
126.plot: Demián confronts Fernando, he says he does not understand why he does not support his presence.

127.title: Sofía decide anular su compromiso con Juan
127.plot: Dr. Gomez, who received money from Fernando to kill Gabriela, assures Sofía that her mother will get well, but Sofía wants a second opinion, which makes Fernando angry.

128.title: Gabriela le pide a Fernando que mate a Juan Reyes
128.plot: Juan claims to Leonora for not informing that they were looking for a man, she confesses that she is afraid of losing him.

129.title: Fernando falla en su intento de matar a Juan
129.plot: Sofia warns Fernando that he calls Dr. Castañeda to see his mother, he opposes and tries to beat her but Damián arrives on time and prevents him.

130.title: Episode #1.130
130.plot: Fernando tells Damián that it will cost him dearly what he did and that he does not threaten in vain, he replies that he is not afraid of him.

131.title: Episode #1.131
131.plot: Gabriela reproaches Fernando who has almost died because of him, since he did not tell him that he dug a well, he justifies himself by making him believe that he wants the best for the farm.

132.title: Episode #1.132
132.plot: Don Agustín tells Demián that he likes her very much, but that it is almost impossible for Sofía to reciprocate.

133.title: Episode #1.133
133.plot: Dr. Gilberto tells Gabriela that she is sick with her soul, tries to convince her that her daughters are good.

134.title: Episode #1.134
134.plot: Juan tells Silvestre that a Campesino told him to take care of his 'girl', he does not know why that word brings back many memories.

135.title: Episode #1.135
135.plot: Juan rides Capricho, Silvestre tries to make him understand that the horse wants to take him home, but Juan refuses to believe it.

136.title: Episode #1.136
136.plot: Gabriela asks Sofía what the orphaned girls are doing in her house, she tells him that they will stay a few days at the hacienda.

137.title: Episode #1.137
137.plot: Gabriela asks what the orphan girls are doing at home. Sofia makes him see that she went for the little ones and the mother superior allowed her to take them a couple of days, so they will stay at the hacienda.

138.title: Episode #1.138
138.plot: Sofia tells Mother Superior that she and Juan want to adopt the three girls, she says that someone else has already completed the adoption application.

139.title: Episode #1.139
139.plot: Sofia tells the Mother Superior that she and Juan want to adopt the three girls. The nun makes it clear that she already has an application that was formally reviewed and approved.

140.title: Episode #1.140
140.plot: Sofia arrives at the Hacienda San Agustín and climbs the stairs while Gabriela watches her and smiles perversely, because she imagines that if Fernando's plan works, her daughter and Juan will never be able to get married.

141.title: Episode #1.141
141.plot: Sofia is very shocked by what she saw, the belt that belonged to Don Bernardo seems to be keeping some secrets, now she feels guilty for what happened to the parents of the Kings.

142.title: Episode #1.142
142.plot: Sofia decides to talk to Juan, she proposes that they separate for a while, since she does not feel comfortable that her own father was the murderer of Juan's parents.

143.title: Episode #1.143
143.plot: Sofia is with the girls and looks very sad, asks Juan what will happen to his daughters, because what he discovered could end with the dream of the two.

144.title: Episode #1.144
144.plot: Juan is very sad because of what Sofía said to him, he begins to make bread very restless and with courage, Pablito arrives at his side and tries to comfort him. Juan collapses and begins to cry, he does not believe what is happening.

145.title: Episode #1.145
145.plot: Juan is making bread, when suddenly, Sofia enters desperate and crying, he gets scared and asks what happens, she tells him that they took the girls, someone else adopted them and they took them, Juan is shocked, can not believe it .

146.title: Episode #1.146
146.plot: Don Agustín visits the notary, who tells him that Don Bernardo made another testament shortly before his death, leaving Sofía as sole heir, as long as he had a son.

147.title: Episode #1.147
147.plot: Fernando, in a hurry, appears with the lawyer, demands a copy of his wife's will, he says that apparently he is not aware that Mrs. Gabriela has changed the testament again and decided to disinherit him.

148.title: Episode #1.148
148.plot: Doña Gabriela tells Sarita that she wants to see how much generosity lasts for Sofía, because she is convinced that the first person who opposes her will tell her that she lives off her charity.

149.title: Episode #1.149
149.plot: Doña Gabriela tells the lawyer that Sofia does not have a daughter, but three and she does not know which of them is her real daughter, she questions if none is and if everything was a trap to snatch what is his.

150.title: Episode #1.150
150.plot: Raquel tells Fernando that life has many ironies, because Sofia has no right to inherit anything. He is surprised and asks why he ensures that.

151.title: Episode #1.151
151.plot: Juan gets tremendous surprise when entering his bedroom, because he meets Ruth. She, naked, tells Juan that she came back for him, as she had promised. Juan, bewildered, stares at her, because he does not know what to do.

152.title: Episode #1.152
152.plot: Raquel goes to Doña Gabriela's house, tells Fernando and her that she has not gone alone, that Ricardo Uribe accompanies her, he enters through the door, while they are shocked to see him.

153.title: Episode #1.153
153.plot: A man approaches Juan, Óscar and Franco, says he is looking for the Reyes brothers. Óscar replies that he has them there, in turn Juan remarks that they are the three Reyes brothers, question who he is and what is offered to him.

154.title: Episode #1.154
154.plot: Sofia decides to talk to Juan, she proposes that they separate for a while, since she does not feel comfortable that her own father was the murderer of Juan's parents.

155.title: Episode #1.155
155.plot: Raquel claims Fernando because he dared to enter his room. It makes her see that her husband or Ruth can enter at any time and they can discover them.

156.title: Episode #1.156
156.plot: Ricardo enters the cabin and finds Raquel and Fernando in a very compromising situation, asks him what he does there alone with his wife, then takes him by the lapel while demanding that he give an explanation.

157.title: Episode #1.157
157.plot: At the hacienda, Juan is kneading to prepare bread, Ruth watches him hidden from an angle, approaches him silently and hugs him from behind, kisses him passionately.

158.title: Episode #1.158
158.plot: Juliana goes to speak with Sofía to ask for Juan, she tells him that she has given her freedom to find a woman with whom she can be happy.

159.title: Episode #1.159
159.plot: Juan explains to Rosendo that he observed that the murderer wore a snake belt, so everything points to Bernardo being the culprit and that is the most real test.

160.title: Episode #1.160
160.plot: Gabriela informs Sofía that the notification arrived that the trial for the impeachment of Bernardo's testament has already begun, she looks at it with surprise.

161.title: Episode #1.161
161.plot: Eva goes to the girls' room, goes through Ruth's room and decides to stop to talk to her, she hopes that she can listen to her.

162.title: Episode #1.162
162.plot: Eva realizes that Dona Gabriela is coming up the stairs, she does not know what to do with Gabriela, who is about to discover Fernando and Ruth kissing.

163.title: Episode #1.163
163.plot: Juan tells Sofia that they should get married as soon as possible, pauses and asks if he still wants to be his wife. She lets him know that she loves him with all her soul.

164.title: Episode #1.164
164.plot: Doña Gabriela, despot, tells Raquel that she has broken all kinds of alliances with her and that from now on they will be enemies, she kicks her out of her house.

165.title: Episode #1.165
165.plot: Doña Gabriela makes Sofia see that she is no longer the owner of anything, because the deadline has expired and everything has returned to her hands, so Ricardo Uribe and his family remain in their ranch, whether they like it or not.

166.title: Episode #1.166
166.plot: Raquel confesses to Doña Gabriela that Ruth is his daughter, she excitedly tells him that it is the best news he has heard in his life.

167.title: Episode #1.167
167.plot: Gabriela, happy, tells Raquel that she knew that something very strong was close to Ruth and that she felt the opposite for Sofia, whom she always denied.

168.title: Episode #1.168
168.plot: Doña Gabriela, moved by the truth, tells Raquel that she is glad Sofia is nothing and announces that as a friend and because she does not hold a grudge, she is going to tell him a truth that she does not know.

169.title: Episode #1.169
169.plot: Raquel, surprised and silent, listens to what Gabriela so long kept silent, tells her that Ruth is not Bernardo's daughter, but Ricardo Uribe's.

170.title: Episode #1.170
170.plot: Dona Gabriela, smiling with laughter, enjoys the impression that Raquel had when listening to her, she looks at her incredulously.

171.title: Episode #1.171
171.plot: Ruth realizes that Juan's horse is at the hacienda and she immediately reacts that he is in Sofia's room.

172.title: Episode #1.172
172.plot: Ruth assures that Juan and Sofía are going to pay for what she runs out of her room, to inform Gabriela that they are together.

173.title: Episode #1.173
173.plot: Dona Gabriela and Ricardo Uribe are in the hacienda's office, they, very close, are about to kiss, when Ruth's voice is heard up the stairs.

174.title: Episode #1.174
174.plot: Ruth, desperate, looking for Gabriela with screams, rushed into the office where her real parents are, these disguised are separated to hear her come.

175.title: Episode #1.175
175.plot: Ricardo confesses to Sofia that he was the one who killed Juan José and María Libia, but he assures that everything was because of Gabriela, she planned everything.

176.title: Episode #1.176
176.plot: Ricardo warns Sofía that if he goes to jail, he will also denounce Dona Gabriela to be locked up; He also confirms that if he dares to say something to the Kings, he will tell them the whole truth so they can take revenge on Gabriela.

177.title: Episode #1.177
177.plot: Sofia talks to Doña Gabriela and asks him why he urged Ricardo Uribe to kill the parents of the Kings, she assures him that out of love he is ready for everything.

178.title: Episode #1.178
178.plot: Sofia discovers that Gabriela was hopelessly in love with Juan José Robles, but she also finds out that he despised her and that's where her hatred started.

179.title: Episode #1.179
179.plot: Dona Gabriela tells Sofía that if she denounces Ricardo, she will also go to jail, that is why she allowed him to stay at the hacienda so as to avoid giving her reasons and denouncing her.

180.title: Episode #1.180
180.plot: Gabriela, blackmails Sofía and tells her that if her idea is to see her in jail, she has all the freedom to denounce Ricardo before the authorities.

181.title: Episode #1.181
181.plot: Oscar, desperate, tries to walk without getting it, makes his best effort, while he is on the ground and crawls as he can to his chair.

182.title: Episode #1.182
182.plot: Oscar, in his eagerness to get up, begins to challenge his fear, rests his hands on the armrests of the chair and tries to sit up.

183.title: Episode #1.183
183.plot: Óscar promises Jimena that for the love they have they will be the man she met, Jimena observes excitedly.

184.title: Episode #1.184
184.plot: Gabriela, annoyed, asks Juan and Sofia if they have already reconciled, they immediately tell her that they have not come to see her just to give her that news.

185.title: Episode #1.185
185.plot: Sofia, happy, tells Doña Gabriela that according to the decision of the judge and by legal disposition, the hacienda and the Elizondo fortune are once again his, she is surprised to hear it.

186.title: Episode #1.186
186.plot: Gabriela, desperate, asks Fernando if he is disappointed in her and if now that he knows he has nothing, he will remain at his side or abandon her to his fate, they look at each other.

187.title: Episode #1.187
187.plot: Raquel lets Gabriela know that Fernando does not love her and much less loves her, this one, annoyed, tells him that he is not at his side for interest but because he is really in love.

188.title: Episode #1.188
188.plot: Raquel confesses to Gabriela Elizondo that she and Fernando were lovers, and that many times they were together in her bedroom and it was from there that he took the snake belt.

189.title: Episode #1.189
189.plot: The Reyes brothers try to open a safe, Franco and Juan press Oscar to concentrate and do so as soon as possible without being discovered.

190.title: Episode #1.190
190.plot: Juan confronts Ruth and asks Sofia to explain that nothing happened between them, she shows him the letter he and his brothers took from the safe.

191.title: Episode #1.191
191.plot: Ruth, surprised, asks Juan where he got that paper, he without taking the importance of its origin, tells him that the most important thing is what he intends to do.

192.title: Episode #1.192
192.plot: Juan tells Ruth that he could deliver the document to the commissioner and get an investigation opened to clarify that strange accident of Doña Gabriela.

193.title: Episode #1.193
193.plot: Juan, supplicant, tells Sofia that he does not know what else to do to forgive him and convinces himself that he is innocent, she asks him for time to think things better.

194.title: Episode #1.194
194.plot: Juan, sad, expresses to Sofía that he regrets that she does not love him as he does, he sentences her that as soon as Gabriela leaves the hacienda, he will do it too.

195.title: Episode #1.195
195.plot: Dona Gabriela, ill, is in her bed, Fernando is at her side, who looks annoyed and asks her to leave because she does not want to see him.

196.title: Episode #1.196
196.plot: Ruth enters Dona Gabriela's room and asks her how she feels, this one, furious, tells them that she is aware that they understand each other and they have deeply disappointed her, they look at each other.

197.title: Episode #1.197
197.plot: Fernando plans to get rid of Gabriela and buys some bottles with medicines identical to the ones she takes, complacent for herself, she says that no one will notice the difference if she consumes them.

198.title: Episode #1.198
198.plot: Fernando knows that Gabriela could die at any moment as a result of her heart condition, with her strategy, Ruth will have to give her half of her inheritance.

199.title: Episode #1.199
199.plot: Sofia and Juan meet their daughters who are cared for by the nuns, he tells her that he has taken them to give him the strength he so badly needs and to fight to get ahead.

200.title: Episode #1.200
200.plot: Juan assures Sofía that he loves her and that he will always be by her side, even if she does not forgive him, she looks at him excitedly and without being able to restrain herself, she embraces him smiling.

201.title: Episode #1.201
201.plot: Gabriela, in her attempt to escape, falls several times getting up, even more frightened, suddenly she puts her hand to her chest where she feels great pain.

202.title: Episode #1.202
202.plot: Doña Gabriela continues running to try to flee, but arrives at a place full of trees that prevent her from moving forward, she feels cornered.

203.title: Episode #1.203
203.plot: Juan tells the commissioner that if his people do not find Fernando, he will look for him until he finds him, he leaves hurriedly. Meanwhile, the commissioner stares at Fernando's photograph, where a reward for his capture is offered.

204.title: Episode #1.204
204.plot: The Reyes brothers place the photograph of Fernando in several places, so that if someone has seen him, report it immediately to the police station.

205.title: Episode #1.205
205.plot: Jimena tells Óscar that they will be happy forever. On the other hand, Sarita and Franco reiterate their unconditional love. Juan and Sofia, they also show their great love.

206.title: Episode #1.206
206.plot: The three Elizondo sisters wait for someone to know who, suddenly they hear the voice of their grandfather Don Agustín, they are very happy to see him, he tells them that he is already aware of everything that has happened.

imdb.title: Fuego en la sangre
plot: The story of three brothers who are looking for revenge, but they find love.::Anonymous
